article_title: Sugar, health-care jobs, diseases of 2016, insurance
article_text:
Sugar, health-care jobs, diseases of 2016, insurance The week's developments in the Texas Medical Center and beyond

Photo: Peter Dazeley, Getty Images

The big health story this week, in and beyond the Houston area, is the U.S. government's release of new dietary guidelines. For more evidence against a high-sugar diet, check out the latest breast cancer research from University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center.

og.description:
The big health story this week, in and beyond the Houston area, is the U.S. government's release of new dietary guidelines. For more evidence against a high-sugar diet, check out the latest breast cancer research from University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center. 
 Here are more highlights of medical developments in the Houston area this week. 
 Jobs: A big, bright spot in Houston's economy is the health care sector.
